name: Gui Long Chao
storyline: Guilongchao is an Oriental-style side-scrolling ARPG mobile game developed and released by Tianren Lab. The story takes place in a new "Kowloon City", composed of nine districts. Here, tradition and modernity collide and blend together, creating a unique retro atmosphere that feels both bizarre and motley. But of course, in the corners where street light doesn't shine, bewilderingly changeable dark forces are surging. You will play the part of a "film director", forming your group of "staff", traversing the diverse scenery of the nine districts where order and chaos coexist. You will gather clues under the guise of "filming" to gradually uncover the hidden truth of this city.
summary: Gui Long Chao is a 3D action-adventure game It takes place in a new city "Kowloon", where tradition and modernity collide. As its name suggests, the city consists of nine neighborhoods, where the streets and alleys are filled with a retro, trendy and bizarre atmosphere. Of course, in the corners where the streetlights don't shine, there are also treacherous undercurrents. You will play the role of a "film director", form a "crew", and set out to collect clues under the guise of "filming" in the nine neighborhoods, where order and chaos coexist in different styles, to gradually uncover the truth buried in the city.
